means: （古代希伯来人作战或举行宗教仪式时吹的）羊角号

sentence.Network_en: The last Trump is the longest time the blower of the shofar can hold a note.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后一次的吹号是吹号者能吹的最长时间.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 是阴道的形状。 产道的形状近似于羊角号(Shofar) 所以产婆也取此词根感恩 14级 2011-07-11  施弗拉和普阿前者是佳美,明艳照人;后者是光芒四射。.
Shoenberg, Sir Isaac 休恩伯格shofar 绍法Shoghi Effendi Rabbani 邵吉?埃芬迪?拉巴尼

means.word_mean: 1. an ancient musical horn made from the horn of a ram; used in ancient times by the Israelites to sound a warning or a summons; used in synagogues today on solemn occasions

auth_sentence.content: One of the synagogue rituals for Rosh Hashanah is the blowing of the Shofar, a ram's horn trumpet.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the synagogue rituals for Rosh Hashanah is the blowing of the Shofar, a ram's horn trumpet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of the synagogue rituals for Rosh Hashanah is the blowing of the Shofar, a ram's horn trumpet.
